package.name: linux
package.patch: cd linux-3.14 [ -f ${SRCDIR}/patch-${PKGVERSION}.xz ] && unxz -c ${SRCDIR}/patch-${PKGVERSION}.xz | patch -p1 cp -v ${SRCDIR}/lesslinux-fblogo-20100922.ppm drivers/video/logo/logo_linux_clut224.ppm cp -v ${SRCDIR}/config-3.14-lesslinux-20140513-1438 .config echo 'CONFIG_ACPI_PROCFS_POWER=y' >> .config cd .. mv linux-3.14 linux-${PKGVERSION}
package.build: cd linux-${PKGVERSION} yes '' | make oldconfig make clean if [ -n "$DISTCC_POTENTIAL_HOSTS" ] ; then jobcount=` expr $DISTCC_HOSTCOUNT '*' 3 ` pump make -j $jobcount CC="distcc gcc" CXX="distcc g++" pump make -j $jobcount bzImage CC="distcc gcc" CXX="distcc g++" else make -j 4 make -j 4 bzImage fi
